sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { decreaseCart, removeFromCart } from "../features/cartSlice"; const Cart = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleRemoveFromCart = (cartItem) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(cartItem)); } const handleDecreaseCart = (cartItem) => { dispatch(decreaseCart(cartItem)); } const handleIncreaseCart = (cartItem) => { dispatch() } return (

Shopping Cart

{ cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is currently empty

Start Shopping
) : (

Product

Price

Quantity

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map(cartItem => (

{cartItem.name}

{cartItem.desc}

${cartItem.price}
{cartItem.cartQuantity}
${cartItem.price * cartItem.cartQuantity}
))}
Subtotal ${cart.cartTotalAmount}

Taxes and shipping calculated at checkout

Continue Shopping
)}
); }; export default Cart;
